title: Client Black Out
body: Not sure if this is a problem with my own computer or if it has something to do with the client but when going into champ select the whole client turns black. It also doesn't let me pick a champ or ban so I end up dodging when not needing to which has been causing a problem lately and now I have a hour ban from even getting into game. The only reason i continued to queue up was because I did not think that the problem with the black client would occur more than once or twice. Anyone know what I should do to fix this problem. My laptop is also fairly new so I do not know why this is even happening.

replies.body: Is this still an issue?  We were [tracking ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-hot-issue-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client)a black screen bug during champion select and were requesting logs.  We hotfixed this overnight, though, so everything should be okay now!  Let me know!

Porocles, there are still some issues here. Got the black screen twice in a row repaired the client and it worked for the one game I played after it.
I'll reply here it happens again.
